1.title: Sunset
1.plot: When humans encroach on King Shujaa's family he seeks advice from the Seer Bahati. Bahati, however, leaves him to his own thoughts fearing what she knew of his future. A ghost from the Kings past only intensifies his fears but to what end?

imdb.plot outline: War threatens to engulf the Savannah when humans attempt to destroy the Lion Pride inhabiting it. Malaika, the Prince, fears they are after his family line due to the generations of demons they possessed. After exiling himself, Malaika finds himself involved with a white lioness, Uzuri, with her own darkness. Love brings them closer together only to be separated by a cry for help. Malaika returns home in hopes of uniting the Prides but his demon has other plans. When lion and human come together in a final battle who is left to tell the tale and who is really controlling the humans?
imdb.title: Shadow Legacy
plot: The Prince from an African Pride of lions must fight a darkness using humans as pawns while fighting a family curse.::Matthew D. Rhodes
